name: Game of Pawns
description: Variation of chess where the only pieces are pawns, created from scratch, 1st project at GA.

name: Chat
description: A chatroom, created and deployed as microservices, but currently running as a monolith. No need to register with real emails.
techonologies: React.js, Express, Spring Boot, Socket.io, auth0, Webpack, Docker, AWS

name: Hello, World
tagline: How to say "Hello" in (almost) every language!
description: Hear how to say hello in the language of countries all over the world.

name: Thank Heaven
description: A website for a real client with fully working admin page, built off using mockups created by a UX team.

name: Anime Pic Picker
description: Grab anime style images using safebooru's API (SFW user moderated image board).

name: Steam Redux
description: Grab news from your favorite Steam games and search up profiles. An exercise in auth/devise.

name: Harmony of Birds
description: Create beautiful music through this app inspired by the video 'Birds on The Wires' by Jarbas Agnelli.

name: MKDREAMDESIGN
description: MKDREAMDESIGN is an Architecture, Interior Design, and Visual branding firm where dreams become reality.
